table.name: vtiger_dailyreports
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_dailyreports` ( `dailyreportsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dailyreportsname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `dailyreportsstatus` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `dailyreportscomment` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `reportsdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `reports_to_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `reportsterm` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dailyreportsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_dailyreportscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_dailyreportscf` ( `dailyreportsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dailyreportsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
